name: spool
description: Helping folk with learning disabilities get involved in policy consultations

scripts.start-ui: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && react-scripts start
scripts.start-dev: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && npm start
scripts.build-schema: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && node ./scripts/updateSchema.js
scripts.setup-database: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && sequelize --config config/database.js --env spool db:seed:all
scripts.build-database: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && sequelize --config config/database.js --env spool db:migrate && npm run setup-database
scripts.reset-database: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && npm run reset-seeds && sequelize --config config/database.js --env spool db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.reset-seeds: if [ -f .env ] ; then export $(cat .env | xargs) ; fi && for f in seeders/*; do sequelize --config config/database.js --env spool --seed "$f" db:seed:undo; done
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run build-database

author: Rupert Redington <rupert@neontribe.co.uk>
